name: Torcik
description:
Torcik, is a little game in which you control character named Torcik. Torcik really wants to eat his delicious birthday cake, but as we all know, birthday cakes require candles, and candles have to be lighted. Unfortunatly Torcik doesn't have a lighter, so he has to carry a torch to his birthday cake, will you manage to light candles on your birthday cake?

This game was created for Triijam #67

theme for which was "it's late", Trijam is a 3 hour game jam, which means this game was created in under 3 hours!

Controlls:

Walk: AD/Left Arrow, Right Arrow

Jump: Space/W/Up Arrow

My Youtube Channel My Discord Server

All assets were made specificlly for this game, by NoelOskar
